Class DBAppointment

        Gets all appointments in the database
        Returns:
        all appointments in the database in an ObservableList of Appointment objects

      • addAppointment

        public static boolean addAppointment​(java.lang.String title,
                                     java.lang.String description,
                                     java.lang.String location,
                                     java.lang.String type,
                                     java.sql.Timestamp start,
                                     java.sql.Timestamp end,
                                     java.sql.Timestamp createDate,
                                     java.lang.String createdBy,
                                     java.sql.Timestamp lastUpdate,
                                     java.lang.String lastUpdatedBy,
                                     int customerId,
                                     int userId,
                                     int contactId)
        Adds an appointment to the database
        Parameters:
        title - appointment title
        description - appointment description
        location - appointment location
        type - appointment type
        start - appointment start date and time
        end - appointment end date and time
        createDate - date and time appointment was created
        createdBy - user that created the appointment
        lastUpdate - date and time of the last update to the appointment
        lastUpdatedBy - user that last updated the appointment
        customerId - customer ID associated with the appointment
        userId - user ID that created the appointment
        contactId - contact ID associated with the appointment
        Returns:
        true if adding was successful. False if not.

      • checkForOverlap

        public static boolean checkForOverlap​(int customerId,
                                      java.time.ZonedDateTime start,
                                      java.time.ZonedDateTime end)
        Checks for overlapping times when scheduling appointments
        Parameters:
        customerId - customer ID
        start - start time desired
        end - end time desired
        Returns:
        true if no overlap. False is there is overlap.

      • checkForOverlapModify

        public static boolean checkForOverlapModify​(int customerId,
                                            java.time.ZonedDateTime start,
                                            java.time.ZonedDateTime end,
                                            int appointmentId)
        Checks for overlapping times when modifying appointment times
        Parameters:
        customerId - customer ID
        start - start time desired
        end - end time desired
        appointmentId - appointment ID of appointment to be modified
        Returns:
        true if no overlap. False if there is overlap.

      • checkForAppointments

        public static boolean checkForAppointments​(java.time.ZonedDateTime logInTime,
                                           int userId)
        Checks for appointments for the user within 15 minutes of log in
        Parameters:
        logInTime - time the user is logging in
        userId - user ID to check
        Returns:
        true if there is an appointment within 15 minutes. False if not.

      • updateAppointment

        public static boolean updateAppointment​(java.lang.String title,
                                        java.lang.String description,
                                        java.lang.String location,
                                        java.lang.String type,
                                        java.sql.Timestamp start,
                                        java.sql.Timestamp end,
                                        java.sql.Timestamp lastUpdate,
                                        java.lang.String lastUpdatedBy,
                                        int customerId,
                                        int userId,
                                        int contactId,
                                        int appointmentId)
        Updates appointment information and saves to the database
        Parameters:
        title - appointment title
        description - appointment description
        location - appointment location
        type - appointment type
        start - appointment start date and time
        end - appointment end date and time
        lastUpdate - date and time of the last appointment update
        lastUpdatedBy - user who last updated the appointment
        customerId - customer ID associated with the appointment
        userId - user ID of the user updating the appointment
        contactId - Contact ID associated with the appointment
        appointmentId - appointment ID
        Returns:
        true if appointment successfully updated. False if not.

        Gets all appointment types in the indicated month
        Parameters:
        month - month to check
        year - year to check
        Returns:
        ObservableList of Strings containing all appointment types in the indicated month, with no duplicates
